name: crazy maze ~疯狂迷宫 ~ 狂った迷路 ~ Laberinto loco ~ Labyrinthe fou ~ Verrücktes Labyrinth
description: Have you challenged the real maze? Welcome to the 3D maze game, take you into a huge maze world to find a way out, we have carefully designed 12 labyrinths, one is bigger than one, one is harder than one!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,windowsXP,windows8,windows10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 160 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
